fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- European project: RRI Tools 
- Policies concerning Responsible Research and Innovation, especially in the current H2020 program
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: We are service providers in Responsible Research and Innovation: we develop research programs that answer societal needs. We work with both private and public structure. In public structure, we launch partnerships between social entrepreneurs and laboratories in order to co-create new products. In private structure we train scientists and technical collaborator, set up teams and manage a responsible research project. We enable the emergence of scientific innovations with positive impacts.
